data.title: Pirate Bay Founders Acquitted in Criminal Copyright Case

Pope Francis warns against “new forms of colonialism”: "Human beings and nature must not be at the service of money. Let us say no to an economy of exclusion and inequality, where money rules, rather than service. That economy kills. That economy excludes. That economy destroys Mother Earth."

Researchers confirm: The Largest Pyramid in Mexico has been found - according to initial measurements, is larger than the Great Pyramid of the Sun in Teotihuacan - we can confirm that this pyramid exceeds in height the pyramid of the Sun at Teotihuacan which measures 65 meters
71% of the world's population lives on less than $10 a day
Pope begs forgiveness for sins and 'offences' of church against indigenous of America
UK to ban WhatsApp under 'snoopers charter' law.
US torture doctors could face charges after report alleges post-9/11 'collusion'
Wind power generates 140% of Denmark's electricity demand
Several killed in shooting by lone gunman in Bavaria, German police say.
Former ExxonMobil Scientist Says the Company Has Long Known of Its Climate Change Impacts
Bodies of WWII US Marines recovered in Pacific.
It’s too late to stop the seas rising at least 5 metres and only fast, drastic action will avert a 20-metre rise

Master recording of Emperor’s WWII surrender speech to be released: Imperial Household Agency plans to make public for the first time the original vinyl master recordings of Emperor Hirohito’s historic speech in which he declared Japan’s surrender in World War II
Ellen Pao Resigns as Reddit Interim CEO After User Revolt
